hero.title: Support Engineer @ Accenture | Infrastructure Engineer | DevOps Specialist
hero.subtitle: Support Engineer @ Accenture | Infrastructure Engineer | DevOps Specialist
hero.bio:
Support Engineer at Accenture for enterprise mining operations and Infrastructure Engineer at Jujuy Water Utility.
Specialized in level 3 technical support, enterprise network administration with Mikrotik, virtualization (Proxmox/Hyper-V), Docker, and DevOps automation, ensuring 24/7 operational continuity of critical systems.
Trained in Cisco CCNA and Mikrotik RouterOS, with expertise in Linux/Windows Server, site-to-site VPN, CI/CD, monitoring (Prometheus), and advanced English level (C2), adding value to complex international infrastructure and automation projects.
